QuestData.Title: The Walk of Shame
QuestData.Description: The echoes of Nar'thalas still haunt me, and I cannot bear the pain of this accursed town any longer. I may still be able to get you closer to the Tidestone, however.$b$b<Farondis' eyes narrow in newfound determination.>$b$bWe will need to skirt around the edge of town. Follow me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Prince Farondis around the edge of Nar'thalas.
QuestData.RewardText: <The prince appears emotionally drained.>$b$bThis is the end of the road for me, $n. I can't bear to look at them. Moreover, my mere presence puts you in danger.$b$bBeyond this point, you must walk alone.
